channel.description: Recent content in adminhtml on Wizguild

item.title: Creating Magento admin grid without database tables
item.description: It’s not common that you have to display something that’s not in the Magento database. It was not too difficult to figure out how to do it but checking this might save you few minutes. Feel free to download the code itself: [Wizguild_VirtualGrid.zip][1]
